name: The Bots of GrindQuest
description:
In this game I wanted to recreate the feeling and art style of older online games like poptropica or adventurequest and tell a story about bots that were made to grind various things that were forgotten and left behind in the game. You go around and talk to NPCs and bots and try to figure out how to solve their problems.

the game is controlled with WAD or the arrow keys and space to jump.

All the art was drawn digitally by me in the time of this jam

Featuring Music by Matthew Pablo
http://www.matthewpablo.com
